item.description:
DARE To Be Phenomenal Women's Business Network
The Success Minded Woman’s Business Network is excited to host the
2nd Annual Holiday Extravaganza!

Networking, Shopping, Gift Bags, Raffles and More!

December 7, 2010 6:00 PM – 8:00 PM Salvatore’s Restaurant • Lawrence, MA

Admission is FREE! Includes gift bag for the first 200 people and entrance into the raffle to win one of 50 phenomenal prizes! Cash bar will be available.

Shop at over 50 Vendor's Tables

Jewelry • Fashion • Specialty Food Products • Health and Beauty • Gifts for Children • Handbags • Gift Baskets
Special Raffle

To benefit the Foster Children of DARE Family Services Help make this holiday season special for these children.
item.name: DARE to be Phenomenal 2nd Annual Holiday Extravaganza!
